ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks
Class PngMetadata

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngMetadata

public class PngMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

We consider "image metadata" every info inside the image except for the most basic image info (IHDR chunk - ImageInfo class) and the pixels values. This includes the palette (if present) and all the ancillary chunks This class provides a wrapper over the collection of chunks of a image (read or to write) and provides some high level methods to access them

Method Detail

getChunk1

public PngChunk getChunk1(java.lang.String id)
Same as getChunk1(id, innerid=null, failIfMultiple=true);

getChunk1

public PngChunk getChunk1(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String innerid,
                          boolean failIfMultiple)
Returns only one chunk or null if nothing found - does not include queued chunks If more than one chunk (after filtering by inner id) is found, then an exception is thrown (failifMultiple=true) or the last one is returned (failifMultiple=false)

Parameters:
id - Chunk id
innerid - if not null, the chunk is assumed to be PngChunkTextVar or PngChunkSPLT, and filtered by that 'internal id'
failIfMultiple - throw exception if more that one
Returns:
chunk (not cloned)
